byline.original: By Telephone to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Old Boys Assn to hear Min Cromwell
snippet: OTTAWA, March 31--James H. R. Cromwell, the United States Minister, who since his arrival here has been much in demand as a speaker at Canadian functions, is to make a second speech in Toronto tomorrow night....

headline.main: CROMWELL TO SPEAK IN TORONTO TONIGHT; Address This Time, However, to Be 'Wholly Academic'

lead_paragraph: OTTAWA, March 31--James H. R. Cromwell, the United States Minister, who since his arrival here has been much in demand as a speaker at Canadian functions, is to make a second speech in Toronto tomorrow night.
